name: Starlight (banyango)
description:
Starlight : My Entry for Ludum Dare 37

You awaken out of hibernation sleep to a ship that is mostly disabled. How did you get here?

Hints:
- Nav Console has a memory address on it. What happens when you type list to see what it is?
- The manual is a great place for ship user info say PersonalLog info

Also if you need to reposition the mouse. press ESC and then click that should center the cursors.
